name: BossBattle Slash UI
description:
Play as a UI Script during an Epic Boss Battle.

Jump around the screen and complete commands by pressing buttons and updating the UI on the edge of the screen.  What does each button do? Good question... That's for you to figure out!

----------------------------

WASD (+Space) / Controller

Escape / B on Xbox Controller = Pause 
(Yes, bad choice for HTML!)

M = Mute Audio

--------------------------

Behind the scenes in every game,
there's heroic code that seeks no fame,
a script so loyal - who performs each frame,
but simply forgotten, no-one ponders their name.

'Main/Player' is not our guy,
nor is 'Enemy/Logic', nor 'Logic/AI',
nor 'Library/Math', 
nor 'Math.2PI',
but our story's hero, indeed,
is 'BossBattle-slash-UI'.

This little script is up to the test.
He runs around fulfilling each request,
and it is certain to me that this script is the best,
a file so essential, yet they live life on the edge.

--------------------------
